## QueueEventsListener."retries-exhausted" property

Listen to 'retries-exhausted' event.

This event is triggered when a job has retried the maximum attempts.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
'retries-exhausted': (args: {
        jobId: string;
        attemptsMade: string;
    }, id: string) => void;
```
